OK, the https://webirc.w3.org/ client (which is an instance of https://thelounge.chat) seems to not handle the encoding properly — even regardless of whether it’s set in the Content-Type header
That client does previews of any link you post — just as Matrix does here

https://www.w3.org/2025/tests/shift_jis-encoding.html is a demo of the same document, but with a proper `Content-Type: text/html; charset=shift_jis` HTTP header. But in TheLounge, the preview for it is mojibake
